event.title: 2010 the tambon had a total population of 76,853, up from 65,503 people reported

data.event: As of 2010 the tambon had a total population of 76,853, up from 65,503 people reported in 2005.

event.title: was again included as part of Thailand about 41 years later

data.event: Yala was again included as part of Thailand about 41 years later.

event.title: September 1977, the King and Queen of Thailand narrowly avoided

data.event: In September 1977, the King and Queen of Thailand narrowly avoided assassination after a bomb exploded nearby during a visit.

event.title: 9 October, policemen from the 12th Provincial Police Headquarters and the Yala Provincial Police Headquarters

data.event: On 9 October, policemen from the 12th Provincial Police Headquarters and the Yala Provincial Police Headquarters arrested Abdun Romae Haron, Mae Prachu and Choning Saing on charges of conspiring with the escaped convicts Hayi Masae, Choya Samae and Abdun Romae in attempting to kill the monarchs.
